pages.text: The kettle, similar to the witch's cauldron, is a type of brewing apparatus used primarily to create infusions but may have other uses. $(br2)Kettles require altar power and a sufficient heat source to function.$(br2)A lack of sufficient power or heat will make a brew spoil, and must be removed before the kettle is used again.
A brew or infusion may be created by filling the kettle with water and dropping the correct items in the correct order into the kettle. Brews can be collected with empty glass bottles once complete.
